description: One of the most famous butchers in Italy has now turned his hand to cooking. At two locations, Solociccia or Officina della Bistecca, the menu is unique and served at a specific time with a meat proposal or a vegetarian option. Solociccia is only open for lunch.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Bring your own bottle', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Terrace']
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
